body: recently i join Avicus and see only 1 game going on in the entire server with like 6 spectators so maybe implement a solo team DTM. have games with like 4-16 players playing individually to destroy other players monument.
body_tagged: recently i join Avicus and see only 1 game going on in the entire server with like 6 spectators so maybe implement a solo team DTM. have games with like 4-16 players playing individually to destroy other players monument.
title: [SUG] Solo DTM

replies.body: I don't think it'll be a good idea.
replies.body_tagged: I don't think it'll be a good idea.

replies.body:
too fast of a game.
*Player 1 leaves to get Player 2's monument*
*Player 3 sneaks into player 1's base and gets to monument*
*Player 3 breaks player 1's monument*

gg over.
replies.body_tagged:
too fast of a game.
*Player 1 leaves to get Player 2's monument*
*Player 3 sneaks into player 1's base and gets to monument*
*Player 3 breaks player 1's monument*

gg over.

replies.body:
I am thinking about this idea. I love the idea but I don't think it will work out well. I think we need to make it 1v1v1v1v1v1v1v1v1 <---- 8 people vs eachother to rush to other bases monuments. Honestly I think we could change the idea up a bit.

2v2v2v2 1 Rusher 1 Defender. It comes down to you if the person doesn't rush/defend well.
